charges.charge_description: 21:841A=CD.F  - CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE - SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE - On or about September 19, 2015, in Adams County, the defendant knowingly and intentionally possessed with the intent to distribute methamphetamine in violation of 21:841(a)(1) and (b)(1)(B).(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant sentenced to 48 months imprisonment; 4 year term of Supervised Release; and $100 special assessment. 1/20/2017 AMENDED JUDGMENT due to clerical error.

charges.charge_description: 21:841A=CD.F - CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE - SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE - On or about September 19, 2015, in Adams County, the defendant knowingly and intentionally possessed with the intent to distribute methamphetamine in violation of 21:841(a)(1) and (b)(1)(C).(2)
